original_text: Even when you were a child, you already knew the message of the Bible. The Bible has taught you how you can be truly wise. You understand that God saves you because you believe in Christ Jesus.
korean_text: 또 어려서부터 성경을 알았나니 성경은 능히 너로 하여금 그리스도 예수 안에 있는 믿음으로 말미암아 구원에 이르는 지혜가 있게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: Even when you were a child
you already knew the message of the Bible
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이미 성경의 메시지를 알고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: how you can be truly wise
because you believe in Christ Jesus
